member.name: T:KangHui.JianHui.Utils.UrlRewriter.RewriterUtils
member.summary: Provides utility helper methods for the rewriting HttpModule and HttpHandler.
member.remarks: This class is marked as internal, meaning only classes in the same assembly will be able to access its methods.

member.name: M:KangHui.JianHui.Utils.UrlRewriter.RewriterUtils.RewriteUrl(System.Web.HttpContext,System.String)
member.param: The HttpContext object to rewrite the URL to.

member.name: M:KangHui.JianHui.Utils.UrlRewriter.RewriterUtils.RewriteUrl(System.Web.HttpContext,System.String,System.String@,System.String@)
member.param: The HttpContext object to rewrite the URL to.
Returns the value of sendToUrl stripped of the querystring.
Returns the physical file path to the requested page.

member.name: M:KangHui.JianHui.Utils.UrlRewriter.RewriterUtils.ResolveUrl(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Converts a URL into one that is usable on the requesting client.
member.remarks: Converts ~ to the requesting application path. Mimics the behavior of the Control.ResolveUrl() method, which is often used by control developers.
member.returns: A resolved URL. If the input parameter url contains ~, it is replaced with the value of the appPath parameter.
